definition: a cut above others/superior
high/tall/above average/loud/your (honorific)
surname Gao
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once

sentences.english: Also, since Japanese people are all about one-upmanship, they only eat baby shrimps.
sentences.chinese: 而日本人的飲食方法更是高人一等，它們只吃幼蝦。

sentences.english: The cold smile on his face made me guess that he considered himself to be superior to others.
sentences.chinese: 從他臉上的冷笑我猜想到他自以爲高人一等。

sentences.english: But the developers also fell prey to one-upmanship.
sentences.chinese: 但是開發商也失去了高人一等的作風。

sentences.english: No one likes snotty people who think they’re better than everyone else.
sentences.chinese: 沒人喜歡那些自以爲高人一等的傲慢的傢伙。

sentences.english: Not self-sustaining as the Venerable, superior, and away from employees, from the masses.
sentences.chinese: 不能自持爲尊者，高人一等，而遠離員工，脫離羣衆。

sentences.english: Mr Brown condescends to all his neighbours.
sentences.chinese: 布朗先生總是以高人一等的態度對待他所有的鄰居。

definition: to think too much of oneself/self-important/arrogant
to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
the eye can see nothing worthwhile all around (idiom); arrogant/condescending/supercilious
overbearing/arrogant bully
to look down upon/to hold in contempt
to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
lit. to order people by pointing the chin (idiom); to signal orders by facial gesture/arrogant and bossy
to think of oneself as high and pure (idiom); smug and self-righteous/holier-than-thou
air of arrogance/haughtiness
arrogance/proud of sth
to look down upon/to despise
set up on high (idiom); not in touch with reality/aloof and remote
to consider everyone else beneath one (idiom); so arrogant that no-one else matters/condescending/to go about with one's nose in the air
high and mighty (idiom); arrogant
arrogant and conceited
to believe oneself infallible (idiom)/to be opinionated
